insert into five_ed_design_drawing (business_key, project_id, project_name, project_no, stage_name, step_id, step_name, major_name, form_no, contract_no, check_time, apply_man, apply_man_name, apply_phone, hand_man, dept_id, dept_name, remark, is_deleted, creator, creator_name, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values (#{businessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stepId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stepName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{majorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{formNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyManName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{handMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update five_ed_design_drawing set business_key = #{businessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_no = #{projectNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stage_name = #{stageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, step_id = #{stepId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, step_name = #{stepName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, major_name = #{majorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, form_no = #{formNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_no = #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, check_time = #{checkTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_man = #{applyMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_man_name = #{applyManName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_phone = #{applyPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hand_man = #{handMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dept_name = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator_name = #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, business_key, project_id, project_name, project_no, stage_name, step_id, step_name, major_name, form_no, contract_no, check_time, apply_man, apply_man_name, apply_phone, hand_man, dept_id, dept_name, remark, is_deleted, creator, creator_name, gmt_create, gmt_modified from five_ed_design_drawing where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, business_key, project_id, project_name, project_no, stage_name, step_id, step_name, major_name, form_no, contract_no, check_time, apply_man, apply_man_name, apply_phone, hand_man, dept_id, dept_name, remark, is_deleted, creator, creator_name, gmt_create, gmt_modified from five_ed_design_drawing
